articles.author: RT
articles.title: Americans say life's too short to waste on work - RT
articles.description: New surveys published this week show that American workers who lost or quit jobs during the Covid-19 pandemic may not rejoin the workforce anytime soon, if at all.
articles.content:
The US Chamber of Commerce recently polled 529 Americans who became unemployed during the pandemic and have yet to return to work.
Over half of the respondents (53%) said they are somewhat active or… [+2372 chars]

articles.author: Scott Neuman
articles.title: How to see the comet Leonard as it nears Earth in coming days - NPR
articles.description: The comet was discovered less than a year ago near the orbit of Jupiter. Now, observers in North America can see it in the northeastern sky around sunrise.
articles.content:
Less than a year ago, when Comet Leonard was first discovered, it was still an incredibly dim and obscure chunk of rock traveling out near the orbit of Jupiter. 
Now it's reached our neighborhood of… [+2765 chars]

articles.author: ITV News
articles.title: Jack Lis: Police apologise as dog reclassified as American bully not American bulldog - ITV News
articles.description: The dog that killed 10-year-old Jack Lis in Caerphilly has previously been identified as an American bulldog but police now say this isn't the case.
articles.content:
Police have confirmed the dog that killed 10-year-old Jack Lis in Caerphilly last month was not an American bulldog, as previously stated.

articles.title: Disney’s Encanto celebrates family, Colombian culture - and the music of Lin-Manuel Miranda - ABC News
articles.description: A misfit teen from a magical family finds her own rhythm in this sweet-natured coming-of-age movie, which represents Disney’s first serious engagement with modern Latin American culture.
